title.narrative: Review and Capacity Assessment of Caritas Denmark (C-DK) and Danmission (DM) under the Strategic Partnership Agreement (SPa)

description.narrative: The overall objective of the Review is to assess the capacity and performance of C-DK and DM in achiving social change and delivering results under its engagement with the MFA with a particular view to stimulate learning and support relevant organisational development. The specific objectives are to: 1) Assess C-DK’s and DM’s overall organisational capacity with a view to implement organisational strategies and achieve agreed results under the Strategic Partnership with MFA. 2) Assess C-DK and DM documentation of results during the Strategic Partnership (2018-) based on HQ visit and selected case-studies. The review should identify recommendations, which will provide a critical input to the MFA’s on-going dialogue with C-DK and DM.

The overall objective of the Review is to assess the capacity and performance of C-DK and DM in achiving social change and delivering results under its engagement with the MFA with a particular view to stimulate learning and support relevant organisational development. The specific objectives are to:
1) Assess C-DK’s and DM’s overall organisational capacity with a view to implement organisational strategies and achieve agreed results under the Strategic Partnership with MFA.
2) Assess C-DK and DM documentation of results during the Strategic Partnership (2018-) based on HQ visit and selected case-studies. The review should identify recommendations, which will provide a critical input to the MFA’s on-going dialogue with C-DK and DM.
